description: Returns configuration for an Object Lambda Access Point. The following actions are related to GetAccessPointConfigurationForObjectLambda:

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID for the account that owns the specified Object Lambda Access Point.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the Object Lambda Access Point you want to return the configuration for.

nested_items.name: Configuration
nested_items.description: Object Lambda Access Point configuration document.

nested_items.name: SupportingAccessPoint
nested_items.description: Standard access point associated with the Object Lambda Access Point.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchMetricsEnabled
nested_items.description: A container for whether the CloudWatch metrics configuration is enabled.

nested_items.name: AllowedFeatures
nested_items.description: A container for allowed features. Valid inputs are GetObject-Range, GetObject-PartNumber, HeadObject-Range, and HeadObject-PartNumber.

nested_items.name: TransformationConfigurations
nested_items.description: A container for transformation configurations for an Object Lambda Access Point.

nested_items.name: Actions
nested_items.description: A container for the action of an Object Lambda Access Point configuration. Valid inputs are GetObject, ListObjects, HeadObject, and ListObjectsV2.

nested_items.name: ContentTransformation
nested_items.description: A container for the content transformation of an Object Lambda Access Point configuration.

nested_items.name: AwsLambda
nested_items.description: A container for an Lambda function.

nested_items.name: FunctionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function.

nested_items.name: FunctionPayload
nested_items.description: Additional JSON that provides supplemental data to the Lambda function used to transform objects.
